channel.title: Problem with Advertisement page
channel.description: Okay, so my server went down for a day from 95% up to 45% up, I felt kinda lucky, but it's been up 24/7 for 3 days and is still stuck at that 45% up time. Ive tried turning off and on, restarting and everything. On other advertisement pages mines 100% so Im assuming there is a bug with it? So if any staff can help me thatd be great!

item.title: Problem with Advertisement page
item.dc:creator: @Noob.Coder Noob.Coder
item.description:
@Noob.Coder wrote:

It’s kind of like school, at the start of the new semester, you don’t have a grade, so you get a 100% on your first paper, then you get a 0% on your next, then that’s a 50%, it’s hard to get all that back up… Even if you scored another 100% your percent would only be at 75%. So leave it up all the time. It will gradually rise. It’s not a bug.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Advertisement page
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

No, it moniters your server from the time you add it. If it went down it lowered your percentage and simply turning it off just lowers your percentage even more. My advice ti you is to leave it up for a while and let the uptime increase.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Advertisement page
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

Its not a bug, just edit your post on the status page.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Advertisement page

item.description:

Okay, so my server went down for a day from 95% up to 45% up, I felt kinda lucky, but it’s been up 24/7 for 3 days and is still stuck at that 45% up time. Ive tried turning off and on, restarting and everything. On other advertisement pages mines 100% so Im assuming there is a bug with it? So if any staff can help me thatd be great!
